title: Be a Real Guitar Hero Vol 1
description:
Tablature and MP3s to learn some nice classic rock songs, inspired by the game Guitar Hero 3. The mp3's can be played with or without the guitar track, so you can play along or be a "guitar hero".

Songs:

Alice Cooper - School's Out
Cream - Sunshine of Your Love
Foghat - Slowride
Heart - Barracuda
In Living Colour - Cult of Personality
Metallica - One (acoustic)
Mountain - Mississippi Queen
Pat Benetar - Hit Me With Your Best Shot
Poison - Talk Dirty to Me
Scorpions - Rock You Like a Hurricane
Sex Pistols - Anarchy in the UK
ZZ Top - La Grange

For all of these songs, the rhythm guitar part is on the RIGHT STEREO CHANNEL and the accompianament is on the LEFT STEREO CHANNEL. So to learn the parts, listen to the right side or both sides while following along with the tablature on the guitar. Once you have it learned, just switch the player to the left channel only and jam along with the band.
